availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis M. Wade (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of Louisa Wade. Married to Narcissa E. Webb Wade in Green County, Kentucky, on November 3, 1864. Farmhand in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 651.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 455A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 001877085, p. 9.
"Francis M. Wade (1837-1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial 98913267, accessed February 24, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/98913267.
